name: Pumpkin Escape
description:
Pumpkin Escape was made in 1 week for Redscript Halloween jam 

"It's Halloween...hard time for all pumpkins. Blodthirsty humans that want to kill you and remove all your insides only to carve some weird pictures in you are everywhere! Escape all humans and stay alive. It's the only thing you can do..."

Some levels are really challenging (at least for me), but they're all possible. I tried and finished all of them.

Game made by 4efk in Godot 

Controls:

movement- w, a, s, d/arrows/touchscreen buttons

jumping- w/arrow Up/spacebar

Important!

Linux build is untested, so please give feedback on how it is/isn't working. Thanks!

Hope you enjoy my game, and type your opinion in the comments please! :)
